code: export const setAuthTokens=(access,refresh)=>{localStorage.setItem('access_token',access);localStorage.setItem('refresh_token',refresh);};export const getAccessToken=()=>{return localStorage.getItem('access_token');};export const getRefreshToken=()=>{return localStorage.getItem('refresh_token');};export const clearAuthTokens=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('access_token');localStorage.removeItem('refresh_token');};export const isAuthenticated=()=>{return!!getAccessToken();};
